mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROGRAM_REGISTER ( TESTER_MODEL, PROCESS_CODE, PART_NUMBER, MAIN_PROGRAM_NAME, GRADE, FAB, FIRMWARE_NAME, FIRMWARE_VERSION, FUNCTION_KEY, TEMPERATURE, TEMPERATURE_GUARD, SBL_YIELD_LIMIT, SBL_SUB_BINA_NUMBER, SBL_SUB_BINA_LIMIT, SBL_SUB_BINA_COUNT, SBL_SUB_BINB_NUMBER, SBL_SUB_BINB_LIMIT, SBL_SUB_BINB_COUNT, SBL_BIN9_COUNTER, PRODUCT_NAME, CUSTOMER, PACKAGE_TYPE, PROGRAM_VERSION, TESTER_OS_VERSION, PARA, DUT_MAP, PASS_BIN_SELECTION, FIRMWARE_DIRECTORY, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_DATE, SBL_BIN9_LIMIT, SBL_BIN8_LIMIT ) VALUES ( #{testerModel}, #{processCode}, #{partNumber}, #{mainProgramName}, #{grade}, #{fab}, #{firmwareName}, #{firmwareVersion}, #{functionKey}, #{temperature}, #{temperatureGuard}, #{sblYieldLimit}, #{sblSubBinaNumber}, #{sblSubBinaLimit}, #{sblSubBinaCount}, #{sblSubBinbNumber}, #{sblSubBinbLimit}, #{sblSubBinbCount}, #{sblBin9Counter}, #{productName}, #{customer}, #{packageType}, #{programVersion}, #{testerOsVersion}, #{para}, #{dutMap}, #{passBinSelection}, #{firmwareDirectory}, #{createUser}, #{createDate}, #{modifyUser}, #{modifyDate}, #{sblBin9Limit}, #{sblBin8Limit} )
